availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Green Berry Tingle, Jr. (Henry County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Green Berry Tingle and Susan Coblin Tingle. Married to Marticia Roberts. Father of Mary F. Tingle. Resident of Henry County in 1860. Indicted in the Henry County Court for stabbing a slave named Turner in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, p. 280.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Port Royal, p. 375A.
